actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE APS_CUSTOMER_BANK_DETAILS SET
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_NAME = '{{vayStlBankNameCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BRANCH_NAME = '{{vayStlBankBranchNameCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO = '{{vayStlBankAccountNoCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM = '{{vayStlBankReAccountNoCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ID_TYPE = '{{vayStlBankClearingCodeCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE = '{{vayStlBankAccountTypeCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_IBAN = '{{vayStlBankIbanCopy.text}}',	
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SWIFTCODE = '{{vayStlBankSwiftCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_NAME = '{{vayStlOfficialNameCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_MOBILE = '{{vayStlOfficialMobileCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_PHONE = '{{vayStlOfficialPhoneCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_EMAIL = '{{vayStlOfficialEmailCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SELFUNDERTAKE = '{{vayStlSelfUndertakeCopy.selectedOptionValue}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE1 = '{{vayStlBankAddr1Copy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE2 = '{{vayStlBankAddr2Copy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_CITY = '{{vayStlBankCityCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_DISTRICT = '{{vayStlBankDistrictCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_ZIP = '{{vayStlBankPostalCodeCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_STATE = '{{vayStlBankStateCopy.text}}',
    CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_COUNTRY = '{{vayStlBankCountryCopy.selectedOptionValue}}'
  WHERE  OID ={{appsmith.store.editCurrentStlbankOID}} and  CUSTOMER_OID='{{appsmith.store.customerOID}}';
